channel.title: 718/742 Ceremonial swords help
channel.description:
hi guys, i got this cool idea. but how do i make it. ?...
my idea is to make it so everytime u hit a monster and u wear a ceremonial weapon u get 1 "ceremonial point" not a currency u can use to anything, well lets say u get 2pts ea hit on mobs. then when u reach 50 pts. i wanna do so that the player witch just reached 50 pts is getting a new sword in either inventory or bank. please help me.
the revision is 718/742
